website_summaries.verdict: This is one of the less expensive 50' hoses available to cover a large area.
pros: Supporting up to 3,100 PSI, many customers prefer this hose over hoses included with most pressure washers
The flexibility of this hose makes it easy to coil and work with
cons: Despite its kink-resistant claim, this hose is prone to kinking and bursting

customer_reviews.title: It's frustrating to spend good money on something and have it fail after just ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only use this about five times. Today this happened in the line and I thought it was going to explode. Made me very nervous. It's frustrating to spend good money on something and have it fail after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! BAD PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return mine today, unfortunately one day too late.....this hose is terrible. I wish I hadn't waited to use it so long, it KINKS the FIRST USE. I got over that, let it go....and it RUPTURED the SECOND USE. If anyone is paying attention to these reviews please let me return this damn thing, I feel so ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Will Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it BURST while using for only the 4th time
customer_reviews.text: I liked this hose while it lasted, which wasn't very long. I purchased this about 5 months ago and according to Amazon it's out of warranty and no way to contact the seller about the issue. While using the hose for the 4 time since purchased it simply burst. It had a longer length and was not super stiff like the OEM hose that came with my pressure washer. Now I understand while the hose needs to be so stiff. These softer hoses simply do not last. Oh and sadly I had finished 90% of my driveway when it burst yesterday :(
customer_reviews.author: FatCobra

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the package from Amazon the hose had ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package from Amazon the hose had a piece of red tape on it. Near the red tape was a splice and a large cut in the hose. Quality control must be on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: “Kink Resistant”
customer_reviews.text: So I recently got a kink and there was zero time to undo the kink. The hose expenaded and exploded in about 15 seconds after the kink happened. I’m using a 2000psi electric pressure washer that realistically puts out probably 1500psi max. In the picture you can see a clear kink and where it exploded
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: burst where is was kinked not a good hose only lasted 90 days
customer_reviews.text: burst where is was kinked not a good hose only lasted 90 days, no warranty
customer_reviews.author: JudyD

customer_reviews.title: Kinky
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hose for about one year. I have used it no more than 15 times. The hose started kinking badly during the first use.I have on several occassions attempted to work the kinks out with negative results. Today the hose burst while Was using it. I hav a fairly nasty welp from being sprayed in the ribs when the hose burst. I am using a Ryobi electric pressure washer, so I am well within the stated limitations of the hose. Given that the hose cost almost half as much as the pressure washer, I am very disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: qpt

customer_reviews.title: Love this pressure washer hose.
customer_reviews.text: This hose is a huge upgrade from the hose that cane with my 2000 PSI Ryobi Pressure washer. The other hose would kink all the time and was hard to use, besides only being 25ft it would stay coiled and it felt like I had 10 ft to work with.when I unwound it. And it was always kinking and stop the water flow. This new hose does not kink and is very easy to work with. Anybody that has an electric pressure washer of any pressure washer with a crappy hose that drives you nuts, you will love this hose it feels like soft rubber but it does not kink up and has enough weight so uncoils eastly,
customer_reviews.author: Shin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Buy at own risk. They DO NOT honor warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hose “while it lasts” unfortunately that’s not even 1/2 a season using once or twice per week. I’ve gone through 2 and although there’s a 2 year warranty the COMPANY nor AMAZON would replace either one within months of breaking. I’m going to try 1 more & IF it breaks & they don’t honor replacement it’s lawsuit time and BBB reporting time in Amazon & manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bockenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hose over the winter to replace my old one. Used it for the first time this weekend and within 3 hours of usage I noticed this failure within the product. Tried contacting the distributor through Amazon and was told my warranty expired and nothing I could do. Poor Product, Poor Support.
customer_reviews.author: John T Lyons

customer_reviews.title: 4th time using it and the hose burst.  I Should Have Read Reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hose in July 2018. Used it 3 times last summer. Used it for the first time this Spring on March 31, 2019 and it burst just like what other purchasers have said. Yes it is very flexible. But you are sacrificing flexibility over durability. This is a "disposable" hose. If you are looking for a hose that will give you a lifetime of use than this is not the product for you. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Browning

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a different material than the hose in their product ...
customer_reviews.text: So I wouldn’t really call this kink resistant. It seems like a different material than the hose in their product review video. That being said the, price point is great. This isn’t a commercial hose by any means but for us weekend car detailers it’s perfect. It does coil up much easier than my stock hose when it’s time to put it away. The 50’ length is a much needed improvement over the 25-30 feet most standard electric pressure washers come with. The color is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty disappointed overall with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed overall with this purchase. Purchased this to replace the 20' that came with my SunJoe SPX3000 and it leaks from the hose end going into the pressure washer gun on the very first use. Now my pressure washer is having to intermittently run to keep pressure up causing wear and tear that wasn't happening with the original hose I wanted to replace. I want my money back. I'd give it zero stars if it was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Better than the OEM hose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 25 ft hose that came with my gas powered power washer rated at 2800psi. I found this hose to be more flexible, less likely to get tangled or kinked and just easier to use in all ways. It far exceeded the OEM hose that I burned a hole into because it kinked up near the motor and the hot engine burned through the jacket. This hose stayed where I pulled it enable me to reach even high places without feeling like i was supporting the weight of extra hose. I was very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hise

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for consumer pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hose since 2017 and have had zero issues with it. It's easy to wind and unwind, and store. I cant figure out why so many have had issues with this hose But some of the images provided by other reviewers clearly shows the hose melted where it burst. This is cause by an inexperienced user allowing the hose to come in contact with the exhaust of the pressure washer. Then guess what? It'll melt the hose and allow it to burst. Can't blame the hose for user error.
customer_reviews.author: zonder

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE HOSE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have hose if you have a little electric pressure washer. The hose that they come with is a cheap plastic style hose that is short and kinks. This hose is a more flexible rubber style hose and has exceeded my expectations. I’m so glad I made the purchase. No more dragging my pressure wash around my vehicle to spray it off this one will reach all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Jorden

customer_reviews.title: People are cry babies
customer_reviews.text: This hose is legit and works perfectly on my pressure washer which is somewhere around 1-3k PSI I almost didn't buy it but the good reviews outweigh the bad which every product surprisingly has but due to common sense I thought rubber is better than cheap made in china plastic hoses that all the other Amazon sellers are trying to push for $20
customer_reviews.author: PhrozenGhost

customer_reviews.title: Fits my ArmorAll pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I paid my own money, as usual, so I have no bias and I wouldn't anyways. I just got it so I can't speak on anything other than it fits my ArmorAll 1600 psi 1.3 gpm pressure washer made by Karcher perfectly without the need for anything else. I did buy a new wand but I'm sure it fits the one it came with. I will update this as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ManWithThePlan

customer_reviews.title: The hose works well with the Honda pressure washer I ...
customer_reviews.text: The hose works well with the Honda pressure washer I bought to make some extra money during the Easter and Christmas Holidays. The pressure is in no way reduced nor is the water blocked. I am using it for 2 and 3 story buildings that need cleaning instead of moving the whole machine the hose just me extra length with a longer wand I bought along with it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Boma

customer_reviews.title: Great hose.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this used and recommended in a video review online. Works great. Looks good. Very well made and solid. Connections tight. No leaks. Longer than original hose for my washer. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice and flexible , no pressure loss.
customer_reviews.text: First use experience, hose is very flexible and light. I used a pressure gauge to measure pressure and saw no difference on the gauge between the 25' foot hose that came with my pressure washer and this 50' hose. When I setup this hose I used a brass quick connect coupler set I got here on Amazon. I highly recommend getting those also.
customer_reviews.author: J. Culp

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for stock Ryobi pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.text: I'm a weekend warrior, so I only use this once a week usually, but in the few weeks I've had it I've been very happy. The hose coils up easily and doesn't kink like the stock Ryobi hose its replacing. EDIT: 3 months in of weekly usage and I still have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: had to modify
customer_reviews.text: Used today first time, both ends leaked. It appears that the o rings are too small, I removed and replaced with thicker gauge (same ID) o rings from original hose that I no longer use. This hose is much easier to handle and coil up when done than the hose that came with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Reeser

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of your old pressure washer hose for this
customer_reviews.text: High quality hose, easy to wrap up and maneuver and never kinked on me as of 3 months of weekly use. Highly recommend to get quick disconnect fittings for the ends of the hose makes it easy to swap out things like pressure washer guns and easy to in/uninstall from your pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Villafana

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose, does not kink and easy to wind back up and hang in the garage when I’m done using it
customer_reviews.text: Nice hose, does not kink and easy to wind back up and hang in the garage when I’m done using it. I also bought quick connect fittings for each end which makes it even easier to connect and disconnect
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 Uses
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I used it 2 times and it burst presumably from the water pressure despite using a machine within the psi limits of the hose. There are others who wrote similar reviews, I wish I had read them before buying. Seller will not refund purchase only pass you on after several emails to manufacturer where you can pay to send the hose back and they might send you another hose, which you wouldn't want anyways.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. The hose was shipped in one day. It replaced the original hose on my Honda Black Cat washer (3100 psi). No problems, no leaks and twice as long as the original. I have a very large patio and driveway configuration. The entire job took 8 hours with my son and I teaming up. A longer hose greatly simplifies managing the movement of everything as you move down the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth robert knowles

customer_reviews.title: Quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the supplied hose for an electric power washer I bought. The original hose kinks, and will not uncoil. It constantly gets tangled and is completely useless. This hose is easy to uncoil, it does not kink and feels very well made. I have only used in a handful of times but I am going to buy a longer one if they make it because I like it so much. Don't usually review things, but this hose is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Don't even have to move the power washer to wash the car.
customer_reviews.text: This makes our power washer so much more easy to use. I can wash twice as much area as before without stopping to relocated the machine. I love this new hose.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Akers

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hose for a couple of days now and so far it is far superior to the cheaper hoses that are half the price. The two 22mm fittings are easier to use than the cheap hose and it is easier to string out without kinking and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Hhrjr

customer_reviews.title: Far better than the original hose provided with the power washer
customer_reviews.text: If you got one of those short, low-quality hoses that is constantly kinking and balling up, toss it in the garbage and get one of these hoses. In several uses, it rarely gave me trouble and generally lay straight. The extra length was great for working around the house, because I have an electric power washer.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Looks elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Does hold pressure well so unless you have a high psi washer it may work but many reviews of hose bursting under pressure. Huge waste of my money. Couldn’t use it with my pressure washer and didn’t know until too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Must add hose to increase length and kink free
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Ryobi 1600 psi power washer and many have recommended this hose as the stock hose that comes with the Ryobi is too short. This hose also doesn’t kink like the stock hose. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mmollat

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: Using this on a 2900 PSI Ryobi gas pressure washer. Works great. The stock hose is garbage. Coils up easy and the 50 feet makes using the washer much more convenient. Trick it so lay it out flat before using so you don’t kink it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility and Maneuverability w/ 1600psi electric powerwasher👍
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mobile detailer in Arizona and need to be able to move around quickly to complete my vehicles before the sun dries them for me, literally time is money in this business. I've purchased other 50ft hoses claiming to be flexible and kink-free, unfortunately none compared to this hose! Though this is a recent purchase, I used it in 100+ degree weather with a 1600psi electric powerwasher and it performed great! If you're worried it will bust, get a warranty, $9 extra is worth the money for adding years to your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GeosAutoDetail

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, but not totally happy with the flexibility. It IS way more flexible than the crappy hard plastic ones that come with your pressure washer, but not AS flexible as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Lovehoseandshoes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hose, no more kinks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Hose, no more kinks. It's like I have a new powerwasher, I have the Karcher 2400 HH with a 5hp. Honda, over 10 years old now better than new. Only advice is uncoil the hose to it's length once you get it hooked up and then when storing keep larger loops to avoid any coiling issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Turner

customer_reviews.title: Product is junk Kionkedand burst in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product in less than a year it kinks and First and the seller has the nerve to say that’s consistent with the age of the item so unless you’re looking for a hose that only last less than a year you should not buy this one it’s garbage and the seller did not fulfill
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lange

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING and I Have Tried 5 Others!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the BEST hose I have used. Light weight and bends without an issue making it easy to move around with. It really is GREAT compared to other hoses I have tried! To the Manufacturer: The only thing I would suggest, if it can be done, would be to make it smooth. The reason is when used with a hose reel, you can guide it with your hand without to much worry. If you did that with this hose, it would burn your hand quite easily. But it really is nice.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Lot more flexible than original hose
customer_reviews.text: I like the hose. It’s way better than the one that came with the machine. It is less flexible than I thought it would be but works great. If you need a another hose I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Edwards Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work, I spent a good chunk of my week maintaining a historic building. Had to replace the hose on our old pressure washer. Used it a dozen or so times by now and the hose is solid, connects well, and has yet to show any signs of kinking or wear
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Oatmeal

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is link free
customer_reviews.text: Really nice hose. Supple and easy to use. You must unroll it completely before use or it will knot up on you. I’m using it with a electric power washer, I think at 1800 psi. Does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: King John

customer_reviews.title: No pressure loss and flexible
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly and no pressure loss. The hose is not as ridged as the original hose which makes it much easy to work with and less likely to contact the hot engine parts.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pressure washer hose
customer_reviews.text: Best pressure washer hose I've come across. Some hoses claim flexibility, and actually aren't very flexible at all. Not this hose. Very flexible, even while under pressure, easy to handle and roll up for storage, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: 757BRC

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible!  Great hose
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old hose that came with my power washer and there is no comparison. This one is so much more flexible and its longer. Highly recommend this hose.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great hose. I can finally reach the top of my house with the power washer.
customer_reviews.author: AROBISON50

customer_reviews.title: Not hosed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neighbor because he needed a longer and more flexible line and this met his expectations. He had his doubts at first about the flexibility and quality but after using it he was impressed and grateful. The price and delivery also met expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Won't last more than a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: As a homeowner, I purchased this product to replace my washer's OEM hose which was too short. I wash my driveway twice a year before upcoming holidays. Two years later and after only a handful of uses, the hose sprung a leak. I've reached out to the manufacturer as Amazon suggested to see if they can possibly replace the hose or offer a solution. Waiting to see what their response is. I would look elsewhere if you want a product that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hose! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Soon as it came in. I tested the hose. I love it! Works great! Perfect fit... From a 25 foot hose, now to a 50 foot hose. I didn't notice if I lost any pressure by adding any extra 25 feet to the pressure washer ( 50 ft ) in total. It worked normal and had plenty of pressure. I'm using this 50' hose to wash my two story home and prepping for painting. Made in the USA. Used it on a gas 2500psi Brute 2.0 GPM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coil memory is strong in this. Very hard ...
customer_reviews.text: The coil memory is strong in this. Very hard to coil up for storage. The pseudo-rubber does feel high quality so a 4
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Why wait to buy, best value hose
customer_reviews.text: I need another one for my other pressure washer, really an excellent hose.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby T.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and finish in the connections. No issues with threads. Hose is lightweight and flexible. Time will tell on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this hose!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose. If you have a TroyBilt 2800psi pressure washer or one like it that takes a hose like this buy this hose! It blows the cheap short hose that comes stock with the washer. This such a huge improvement over the original.
customer_reviews.author: W. Herrboldt

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: there's. Its junk 3 uses on a 3100 psi washer then split, spend the money a buy the metal braded poly cover hose , it will last for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fayard

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for my Power washer
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hose for my power washer. Purchased as a replacement. Works well and is quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose
customer_reviews.text: Hose is very nice and flexible. Works great with my 2800 psi washer. Nice long length, and does not kink or snag.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Flexible but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Good flexibility but not durable at all. I’ll be lucky to get one summer out of this hose as the outer cover is already showing signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Like fighting with a wild snake
customer_reviews.text: This hose appears to be kink resist but was billed as being flexible. It coils up constantly like any other pressure washer hose! Constantly coiling up and getting caught on everything. Then when trying to hang it on the holder on my pressure washer, at 50' it's like trying to coil up a live snake! Hardly flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best pressure washer hose I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best pressure washer hose I've owned. Doesn't kink easily and the length saves me a lot of time at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little less than two years and may have used it 6-8 times. The outer surface is cracked and brittle, Straightening the hose is next to impossible as it kinks very easily. I readily concede that I am not a highly knowledgeable consumer, these problems began during the first year. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Owens

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose. Has great thickness, well made. Fits my pressure washer exactly like original, except longer. Would recommend as a replacement to the original.
customer_reviews.author: Matrixman

customer_reviews.title: NOT kink fee
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, still very much kinks up, I bought this less than a month ago. Used once or twice. . kinked up knotted and hose balloned up and exploded .
customer_reviews.author: MPenderlbz

customer_reviews.title: Junk - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: For a non Kink hose , it kinked in several places during the first use. This OEM should take action ! 1 STAR
customer_reviews.author: Chex

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Seems to be a great quality replacement hose. The original hose was stiff but this one is much better- more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE HOSE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hose is garbage like everyone else is saying. And they do not stand behind the warranty. Buy another hose or you will get hosed!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Great hose for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great pressure washer hose. It coils with ease, it long enough to make it useful, and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not kink free
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but tanles unless rolled out prior to use, like the one I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: About as kind free as you are going to get in a quality built hose.
customer_reviews.author: dennis russell

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 10 hours of use time, states it was kink resistant and kinked and ruptured after barely any use. The warranty period for returns was only 30 days and it failed in 45 days. What a piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flexible hose. I am super happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: chris w.

customer_reviews.title: HOSE
customer_reviews.text: This hose is better than the original that came with the machine. its is very flexible and better material than the original. excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chichi

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since I received it on April 1, 2020. A lot of people have said that it kinks to easy causing it to bubble as shown by other buyer I leave mine coiled up hanging on the wall but I straighten it out before each use I use it about 3 or 4 times a week for over an hour or two Increments so far it’s holding up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: JAMES AYALA

customer_reviews.title: Breaks immediately
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I used it. It ruptured after 10 minutes. Lost an entire pretty Saturday of productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, this hose does kink and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, this hose does kink and ruptures. Im sending mine back. Only got 3 weeks use out of mine. I figure it must be made somewhere else and not in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: All in all it's a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Not Heavy duty. It meets the pressure requirements, but I melted my original hose on my exhaust. This one is not as durable as the original so I will have to be careful. All in all it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: LOBO

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Replace old hose that developed a leak. Got 50 foot size and is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: much better than the hose that came with it and the replacement I bought that looked just like the replacement. They both kinked and broke. This one is 10 times better
customer_reviews.author: P. Foley

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: Used this hose for about 6 hours in May washing the pool deck and furniture. Took it out yesterday Aug 11 to wash a garage floor and about 10 minutes into a one hour wash, the hose has this bulge about the size of a tennis ball which I'm sure will burst soon. Product support from Amazon ended on Aug 10.
customer_reviews.author: Randy M.

customer_reviews.title: Blow Out!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second hose due to the first one blowing out. The first time we used the second one it blew out as well, we had to finish washing the house so my husband had to go to the store to get a repair kit just as we were finishing up it blew out in another spot.
customer_reviews.author: LetItGrow

customer_reviews.title: Those o rings...
customer_reviews.text: Great hose with great flexibility BUT, the included o rings are to thin to seal. Luckily I was able to use the ones from the shorter I had on hand to make this work. Certainly something the manufacturer should fix.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadors

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hose at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality high pressure hose and does not kink like the original hose. The ends do screw on easier than my old hose and I like that it is easy to take on and off my machine and wand. It is easy to roll up and place for storage. Very fast shipping!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendee L.

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with how well it's holding up
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this to wash his car and it has performed well. I am very pleased with how well it's holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Manley

customer_reviews.title: Good hose and connectors but hose is not kink free
customer_reviews.text: Good hose and connectors but hose is not kink free. However is better than original hose and doesn't kink as much as regular hose. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it very long but it seems to be made very well and kink resistant. Longevity is unknown for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Exploded
customer_reviews.text: Well this upsetting while putting my hose to use it expanded like a balloon and exploded I hope the company takes returns because I’m unhappy and rather have my money back.?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great value - time will tell if it springs a bulge or leak, then I will be :(
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, fittings work, easily attached to wand and washer. Cannot beat the price !!
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Hose
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much I bought one for my son as well
customer_reviews.author: SSVW

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just dont leave in hot sun long or it will blister
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hose for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far. Much more flexible than the OEM hose and I love the extra length. Because of its smaller diameter and flexibility it fits in the same space also.
customer_reviews.author: BigBlueXC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! If you want more info
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! If you want more info, just search for it on YouTube. As always, you can't beat Amazon pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resist kinks
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hose. we use our pressure washer rarely but dreaded using it with the old hose due to fighting with the hose. This one does really resist kinks, now even my son doesn't mind getting the pressure washer out.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement hose
customer_reviews.text: Really like this hose compared to the stock hose. It is very flexible, coils up great and lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement hose
customer_reviews.text: Like the soft rubberized coating on the outside. Seems to be less likely to kink up than my original hose. Perfect fit with the connectors to both the machine and the gun. This one has identical connectors on both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been working perfect with my electric Ryobi pressure washer. Nice long line and doesn’t kink, easy to wind up, very flexible but strong. Will purchase again if I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: ERS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible experience!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience, bursted on me after 30 minutes of use, mine is a 3000psi washer. Terrible and wet! Likely I bought it from amazon and they have nice customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Dlion888

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great hose. Ran it for about 6 hours no kinks no issues. Rolled it out straight before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total JUNK!!!!! One end came uncoupled less than a year owning it. I maybe used the hose for two hours if that. I am running 3000 psi through it. SAD!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BravesDiva Nails

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It does what is says so far it seem kink resistant so far
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Uberflex Hose
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 3400 PSI washer, very flexible and easy to maneuver. don't slide it thru your hands as it will burn quickly from friction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go with flexilla... Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Hose kinks on me all the time. I must unwind hose all the way to be usable. Doesn't like it uncoil itself. Switching out because I'm tired of dealing with this "kink free" hose
customer_reviews.author: Pucktastic3

product_meta.title: UBERFLEX Kink Resistant Pressure Washer Hose 1/4" x 50' 3,100 PSI with (2) 22MM
product_meta.description:
ProPulse® UBERFLEX™ Kink Resistant 1/4" x 50' 3,100 PSI Pressure Washer Hose with standard 22MM-14 Twist Connects. The most flexible hose in the industry! The latest technology from ProPulse® delivers a revolutionary upgrade from the standard consumer grade and light commercial duty cold water pressure washer hose. UBERFLEX™ possesses the unique properties of superior resistance to permanent kinking and abrasion

Features:
• MADE IN THE USA: Every foot of ProPulse® UBERFLEX™ is designed, engineered and manufactured in the USA, assembled using imported and/or domestic end fittings
• PERMANENT KINK RESISTANCE: Let’s face it—all hoses can be kinked under the right conditions, but the unique UberFlex technology ensures that if the hose is pinched or kinked, it won’t stay that way permanently
• FLEXIBILITY: UberFlex feels more like an extension cord than a hose, and possesses the smallest bend radius in its class 
• TEXTURED COVER: The textured cover upgrade reduces tack and snag tendencies during handling, dragging and reeling 
• UNMATCHED ABRASION, OZONE, UV AND CHEMICAL RESISTANCE: The proprietary high performance of the UberFlex cover is at least five times more abrasion resistant than traditional PVC covered hose



Hose Construction
• Inner Tube: Proprietary water and chemical resistant rubberized thermoplastic blend
• Reinforcement: Dual-ply high tenacity polyester with ProPulse® exclusive length stabilizing technology 
• Cover: Abrasion resistant polyurethane, ProPulse exclusive low tack, low friction finish.
NOT FOR HOT WATER OR STEAM
feature_bullets: The most flexible hose in the industry! MADE IN THE USA
The latest technology from ProPulse delivers a revolutionary upgrade from the standard consumer grade and light commercial duty cold water pressure washer hose
UBERFLEX possesses the unique properties of superior resistance to permanent kinking and abrasion
Works on many pressure washers with dual standard 22mm-14 female twist connects
3,100 PSI working pressure - 1/4" ID x 50' long - Ends: (2) 22mm-14 Female twist connects
